Sentencas: The high-temperature mechanical properties of a newly developed silicate-based glass sealant, designated as GC-9, have been studied for use in planar solid oxide fuel cell (pSOFC).
Titulo: High-temperature mechanical properties of a glass sealant for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Four-point bending tests were conducted at room temperature, 550 degrees C, 600 degrees C. 650 degrees C, 700 degrees C and 750 degrees C to investigate the variation of flexural strength, elastic modulus, and stress relaxation with temperature for the given glass sealant.
Titulo: High-temperature mechanical properties of a glass sealant for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Weibull statistic analysis was applied to describe the fracture strength data.
Titulo: High-temperature mechanical properties of a glass sealant for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The results indicated that the flexural strength was increased with temperature when the testing temperature was below the glass transition temperature (T-g, 668 degrees C).
Titulo: High-temperature mechanical properties of a glass sealant for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This was presumably caused by a crack healing effect taking place at high temperatures for glasses.
Titulo: High-temperature mechanical properties of a glass sealant for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: However, with a further increase of temperature to a level higher than Tg, significant stress relaxation was observed to cause extremely large deformation without breaking the specimen.
Titulo: High-temperature mechanical properties of a glass sealant for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: When the controlled displacement rate was increased by an order of magnitude, the stress relaxation effect at 750 degrees C became less effective.
Titulo: High-temperature mechanical properties of a glass sealant for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: However, the mechanical stiffness of the given glass was significantly reduced at a temperature higher than T-g. (C) 2008
Titulo: High-temperature mechanical properties of a glass sealant for solid oxide fuel cell
